GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.15.63
GSD.description:
tracing/eprobes: Have event probes be consistent with kprobes and uprobes

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.63 by commit b489aca082a23033a3d8355cfb0032f0e2523440, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 7491e2c442781a1860181adb5ab472a52075f393. For more details please see the references link.
